definition: Ba state during Zhou dynasty (in east of modern Sichuan)/abbr. for east Sichuan or Chongqing/surname Ba/abbr. for Palestine or Palestinian/abbr. for Pakistan

to long for/to wish/to cling to/to stick to/sth that sticks/close to/next to/spread open/informal abbr. for bus 巴士[ba1 shi4]/bar (unit of pressure)/nominalizing suffix on certain nouns, such as 尾巴[wei3 ba5], tail
to cut down/to fell/to dispatch an expedition against/to attack/to boast/Taiwan pr. [fa1]

sentences.english: We can thank God for Bavarian sugar cookies.
sentences.chinese: 我们可以感谢上帝的巴伐利亚糖曲奇。

sentences.english: How can a Bavarian fest be complete without a beer garden?
sentences.chinese: 第一大众被服侍到巴伐利亚的总理。
巴伐利亚是个思想很传统的地区。

sentences.english: The first mass is served to the Bavarian Prime Minister.
sentences.chinese: 第一大众被服侍到巴伐利亚的总理。

sentences.english: Huge parades with horses and bands are held in Eastern Bavaria.
sentences.chinese: 和巨大的游行乐队与马东巴伐利亚举行。

sentences.english: When he was 6 he played for the bavarian Elector and Empress.
sentences.chinese: 他6岁时就为巴伐利亚选帝侯和王后演奏曲目。

sentences.english: Rumple Minze is a peppermint schnapps imported from the Black Forest in Bavaria.
sentences.chinese: 这是一种从巴伐利亚黑森林进口的薄荷甜酒。

sentences.english: Berger was flying to Bavaria that night to take charge of them.
sentences.chinese: 柏格尔那天晚上要飞到巴伐利亚去主持此事。

sentences.english: You are listening to the news on Bavarian Radio.
sentences.chinese: 您现在所收听的是巴伐利亚电台为你播报的新闻。

definition: Sachsen or Saxony, Bundesland in east of Germany, bordering on Poland and Czech republic, capital Dresden 德累斯頓|德累斯顿[De2 lei4 si1 dun4]
Württemberg, region of southwest Germany, former state around Stuttgart 斯圖加特|斯图加特[Si1 tu2 jia1 te4]
München or Munich, capital of Bavaria, Germany
the Franks (Germanic people who arrived in Europe from 600 AD and took over France)
Dresden, capital of Saxony 薩克森州|萨克森州[Sa4 ke4 sen1 zhou1], Germany
Bohemia, historical country of central Europe
Sachsen or Saxony, Bundesland in east of Germany, bordering on Poland and Czech republic, capital Dresden 德累斯頓|德累斯顿[De2 lei4 si1 dun4]
